scripts.prepare: npm update --dev vl-ui-util && npm run prepare:util
scripts.prepare:util: npm explore vl-ui-util -- npm run util
scripts.test: npm explore vl-ui-util -- npm run test
scripts.test:unit: npm explore vl-ui-util -- npm run test:unit
scripts.test:e2e: npm explore vl-ui-util -- npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:grid: npm explore vl-ui-util -- npm run test:grid
scripts.release:prepare: npm run release:prepare:build && npm run release:prepare:imports && npm run release:prepare:css && npm run release:prepare:commit
scripts.release:prepare:commit: git add -f vl-header.js && git commit --amend --no-edit && git pull
scripts.demo: npm explore vl-ui-util -- npm run demo
